title: MacKenzie Scott Donates $3.86 Billion to 465 Organizations in Less Than a Year
sub_head: Billionaire philanthropist gave to groups including Planned Parenthood, Habitat for Humanity and the Boys & Girls Clubs of America, aiming to support needs of underrepresented groups
body:
MacKenzie Scott said she has given $3.86 billion to 465 groups over the past nine months, marking the latest round of funding for the billionaire philanthropist who has pledged to donate the majority of her fortune to charity.
Ms. Scott, one of the richest women in the world, said she aimed to support the needs of underrepresented groups. The hundreds of recipients that received funds varied widely in their focus, including organizations working in education, climate change and criminal justice.
